work_experience.responsibilities: Maintained employee compensation, benefits, PTO, timecards, and promotion records. Conducted new hire and existing employee training on benefits and company policies. Managed background checks, drug tests, and disciplinary actions. Coordinated hiring by posting jobs, reviewing resumes, conducting phone interviews, and managing onboarding and exit processes.

Sourced and recruited candidates for various departments. Managed applicant tracking and onboarding through BrassRing. Conducted initial phone interviews, scheduled interviews, and organized job fairs. Administered applicant testing, background checks, and drug screenings. Maintained applicant files and generated recruitment reports.

Processed invoices and credit memos accurately and on time. Managed collections, reconciliations, and vendor relations. Ensured timely payments, reviewed product return documents, and resolved billing issues. Oversaw expense reports and payment transactions.

Updated customer databases, managed AR/AP and collection records, and balanced daily revenue. Coordinated travel logistics, maintained personnel and subcontractor data, and verified timecards for accuracy.

voluntary experience.description: Volunteered to mentor kids and young adults, guiding them in school and career success.
